amendment.description: An amendment numbered 129 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prohibit the use of funds made available to be used for the EPA's rule on emissions form small remote incinerators in Alaska.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young amendment (A047) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Young amendment (A047) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A047) offered by Mr. Young.
